ol.li: Go to the Analyzer dashboard, select Data Design from the dropdown list, click Reports. The Manage Report screen with the current listing of reports is displayed.
Check the reports that you want to duplicate.
Click the Duplicate button on the top menu.

conbody.p: The report is now duplicated and appears after the original report in the Report Listing. It is identifed by its version number. For example, if this is the only duplicate, it is identified with a (2) after the report name.
